dialogues.text: The big creature is getting agitated and yells out some  unintelligible gibberish at the now rather nervous, young adventurer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't insult us. You just watch  yourself. We're wanted men. I have  the death sentence in twelve systems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll be careful than.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll be dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rodent lets out a loud grunt and everything at the ba moves away. Luke tries to remain cool but it isn't easy. three adversaries ready their weapons. Old Ben moves in b Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This little one isn't worth the  effort. Come let me buy you  something...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A powerful blow from the unpleasant creature sends the yo would-be Jedi sailing across the room, crashing through t and breaking a large jug filled with a foul-looking liqui With a blood curdling shriek, the monster draws a wicked  chrome laser pistol from his belt and levels it at old Be The bartender panics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No blasters! No blaster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With astounding agility old Ben's laser sword sparks to l and in a flash an arm lies on the floor. The rodent is cu in two and the giant multiple-eyed creature lies doubled, cut from chin to groin. Ben carefully and precisely turns off his laser sword and replaces it on his utility belt.  Luke, shaking and totally amazed at the old man's abiliti attempts to stand. The entire fight has lasted only a mat of seconds. The cantina goes back to normal, although Ben given a respectable amount of room at the bar. Luke, rubb his bruised head, approaches the old man with new awe. Be points the the Wookiee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Chewbacca. He's first-mate  on a ship that might suit our needs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio paces in front of the cantina as Artoo carries o an electronic conversation with another little red astro- droid. A creature comes out of the cantina and approaches two stormtroopers in the street.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like the look of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Strange creatures play exotic big band music on odd-looki instruments as Luke, still giddy, downs a fresh drink and follows Ben and Chewbacca to a booth where Han Solo is  sitting. Han is a tough, roguish starpilot about thirty y old. A mercenary on a starship, he is simple, sentimental and cocksure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo. I'm captain of the  Millennium Falcon. Chewie here tells  me you're looking for passage to the  Alderaan system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, indeed. If it's a fast ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fast ship? You've never heard of the  Millennium Falcon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Should I have?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the ship that made the Kessel  run in less than twelve parsecs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben reacts to Solo's stupid attempt to impress them with  obvious misinformation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've outrun Imperial starships, not  the local bulk-cruisers, mind you.  I'm talking about the big Corellian  ships now. She's fast enough for  you, old man. What's the cargo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only passengers. Myself, the boy,  two droids, and no questions asked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? Some kind of local  trouble?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's just say we'd like to avoid  any Imperial entanglements.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, that's the trick, isn't it?  And it's going to cost you something  extra. Ten thousand in advance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten thousand? We could almost buy  our own ship for that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But who's going to fly it, kid! You?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You bet I could. I'm not such a bad  pilot myself! We don't have to sit  here and listen...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We haven't that much with us. But we  could pay you two thousand now, plus  fifteen when we reach Alderaan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seventeen, huh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han ponders this for a few moments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. You guys got yourself a ship.  We'll leave as soon as you're ready.  Docking bay Ninety-four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ninety-four.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like somebody's beginning to  take an interest in your handiwork.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben and Luke turn around to see four Imperial stormtroope looking at the dead bodies and asking the bartenders some questions. The bartender points to the booth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, we'll check it out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stormtroopers look over at the booth but Luke and Ben are gone. The bartender shrugs his shoulders in puzzlemen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seventeen thousand! Those guys must  really be desperate. This could really  save my neck. Get back to the ship  and get her ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll have to sell your speeder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's okay. I'm never coming back  to this planet again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Han is about to leave, Greedo, a slimy green-faced ali with a short trunk-nose, pokes a gun in his side. The cre speaks in a foreign tongue translated into English subtit

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Going somewhere, Solo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Greedo. As a matter of fact, I  was just going to see your boss.  Tell Jabba that I've got his money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han sits down and the alien sits across from him holding gun on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too late. You should have paid  him when you had the chance. Jabba's  put a price on your head, so large  that every bounty hunter in the galaxy  will be looking for you. I'm lucky I  found you first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, but this time I got the money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you give it to me, I might forget  I found you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have it with me. Tell Jabba...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jabba's through with you. He has no  time for smugglers who drop their  shipments at the first sign of an  Imperial cruiser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even I get boarded sometimes. Do you  think I had a choice?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo slowly reaches for his gun under the table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can tell that to Jabba. He may  only take your ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over my dead body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the idea. I've been looking  forward to killing you for a long  time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I'll bet you have.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the slimy alien disappears in a blinding flash o light. Han pulls his smoking gun from beneath the table a the other patron look on in bemused amazement. Han gets u and starts out of the cantina, flipping the bartender som coins as he leaves.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry about the mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several TIE fighters approach the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Her resistance to the mind probe is  considerable. It will be some time  before we can extract any information  from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Imperial Officer interrupts the meeting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The final check-out is complete. All  systems are operational. What course  shall we set?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Perhaps she would respond to an  alternative form of persuasion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think it is time we demonstrate  the full power of this station. (to soldier) Set your course for Princess Leia's  home planet of Alderaan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With pleasure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Four heavily-armed stormtroopers move menacingly along a  narrow slum alleyway crowed with darkly clad creatures ha exotic goods in the dingy little stalls. Men, monsters, a robots crouch in the waste-filled doorways, whispering an hiding from the hot winds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lock the door, Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the troopers checks a tightly locked door and move on down the alleyway. The door slides open a crack and  Threepio peeks out. Artoo is barely visible in the backgr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, check that side of the  street. It's secure. Move on to the  next door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The door opens, Threepio moves into the doorway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I would much rather have gone with  Master Luke than stay here with you.  I don't know what all the trouble is  about, but I'm sure it must be your  fault.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo makes beeping sounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You watch your language!

dialogues.speaker: SPEEDER LOT
dialogues.text: Ben and Luke are standing in a sleazy used speeder lot,  talking with a tall, grotesque, insect-like used speeder  dealer. Strange exotic bodies and spindly-legged beasts p by as the insect concludes the sale by giving Luke some c

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says it's the best he can do.  Since the XP-38 came out, they're  just not in demand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It will be enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben and Luke leave the speeder lot and walk down the dust alleyway past a small robot herding a bunch of anteater-l creatures. Luke turns and gives one last forlorn look at faithful speeder as he rounds a corner. A darkly clad cre moves out of the shadows as they pass and watches them as they disappear down another alley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If the ship's as fast as he's  boasting, we ought to do well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jabba the Hut and a half-dozen grisly alien pirates and p creatures stand in the middle of the docking bay. Jabba i the grossest of the slavering hulks and his scarred face a grim testimonial to his prowess as a vicious killer. He a fat, slug-like creature with eyes on extended feelers a a huge ugly mouth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on out, Solo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A voice from directly behind the pirates startles them an they turn around to see Han Solo and the giant Wookiee,  Chewbacca, standing behind them with no weapons in sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been waiting for you, Jabba.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I expected you would be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not the type to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (fatherly-smooth) Han, my boy, there are times when  you disappoint me... why haven't you  paid me? And why did you have to fry  poor Greedo like that... after all  we've been through together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sent Greedo to blast me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (mock surprise) Han, why you're the best smuggler in  the business. You're too valuable to  fry. He was only relaying my concern  at your delays. He wasn't going to  blast you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think he thought he was. Next time  don't send one of those twerps. If  you've got something to say to me,  come see me yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, Han! If only you hadn't had to  dump that shipment of spice... you  understand I just can't make an  exception. Where would I be if every  pilot who smuggled for me dumped  their shipment at the first sign of  an Imperial starship? It's not good  business.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, even I get boarded  sometimes, Jabba. I had no choice,  but I've got a charter now and I can  pay you back, plus a little extra. I  just need some more time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to his men) Put your blasters away. Han, my boy,  I'm only doing this because you're  the best and I need you. So, for an  extra, say twenty percent I'll give  you a little more time... but this  is it. If you disappoint me again,  I'll put a price on your head so  large you won't be able to go near a  civilized system for the rest of  your short life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jabba, I'll pay you because it's my  pleasure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca waits restlessly at the entrance to Docking Bay 94.  Ben, Luke, and the robots make their way up the stre Chewbacca jabbers excitedly and signals for them to hurry The darkly clad creature has followed them from the speed lot.  He stops in a nearby doorway and speaks into a smal transmitter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca leads the group into a giant dirt pit that is  Docking Bay 94. Resting in the middle of the huge hole is large, round, beat-up, pieced-together hunk of junk that  could only loosely be called a starship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What a piece of junk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tall figure of Han Solo comes down the boarding ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She'll make point five beyond the  speed of light. She may not look  like much, but she's got it where it  counts, kid. I've added some special  modifications myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke scratches his head. It's obvious he isn't sure about all this. Chewbacca rushes up the ramp and urges the othe to follow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're a little rushed, so if you'll  hurry aboard we'll get out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group rushes up the gang plank, passing a grinning Ha Solo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca settles into the pilot's chair and starts the m engines of the starship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Ben, Threepio, and Artoo move toward the Millennium Falcon passing Solo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hello, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eight Imperial stormtroopers rush up to the darkly clad  creature.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The darkly clad creature points to the door of the dockin bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, men. Load your weapons!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The troops hold their guns at the ready and charge down t docking bay entrance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop that ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo looks up and sees the Imperial stormtroopers rus into the docking bay. Several of the troopers fire at Han he ducks into the spaceship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blast 'em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han draws his laser pistol and pops off a couple of shots which force the stormtroopers to dive for safety. The  pirateship engines whine as Han hits the release button t slams the overhead entry shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, get us out of here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group straps in for take off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my. I'd forgotten how much I  hate space travel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The half-dozen stormtroopers at a check point hear the ge alarm and look to the sky as the huge starship rises abov the dingy slum dwellings and quickly disappears into the  morning sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han climbs into the pilot's chair next to Chewbacca, who  chatters away as he points to something on the radar scop

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Corellian pirateship zooms from Tatooine into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han frantically types information into the ship's compute Little Artoo appears momentarily at the cockpit doorway,  makes a few beeping remarks, then scurries away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks like an Imperial cruiser.  Our passengers must be hotter than I  thought. Try and hold them off. Angle  the deflector shield while I make  the calculations for the jump to  light speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon pirateship races away from the yell planet, Tatooine. It is followed by two huge Imperial  stardestroyers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Over the shoulders of Chewbacca and Han, we can see the g spread before them. Luke and Ben make their way into the  cramped cockpit where Han continues his calculation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay sharp! There are two more coming  in; they're going to try to cut us  off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why don't you outrun them? I thought  you said this thing was fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch your mouth, kid, or you're  going to find yourself floating home.  We'll be safe enough once we make  the jump to hyperspace. Besides, I  know a few maneuvers. We'll lose  them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imperial cruisers fire at the pirateship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship shudders as an explosion flashes outside the win

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here's where the fun begins!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How long before you can make the  jump to light speed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll take a few moments to get the  coordinates from the navi-computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship begins to rock violently as lasers hit it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you kidding? At the rate they're  gaining...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traveling through hyperspace isn't  like dusting crops, boy! Without  precise calculations we could fly  right through a star or bounce too  close to a supernova and that'd end  your trip real quick, wouldn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is now constantly battered with laserfire as a r warning light begins to flash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's that flashing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're losing our deflector shield.  Go strap yourself in, I'm going to  make the jump to light speed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The galaxy brightens and they move faster, almost as if  crashing a barrier. Stars become streaks as the pirateshi makes the jump to hyperspace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon zooms into infinity in less than a  second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alderaan looms behind the Death Star battlestation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Admiral Motti enters the quiet control room and bows befo Governor Tarkin, who stands before the huge wall screen  displaying a small green planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've entered the Alderaan system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and two stormtroopers enter with Princess Leia. Her hands are bound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Governor Tarkin, I should have  expected to find you holding Vader's  leash. I recognized your foul stench  when I was brought on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Charming to the last. You don't know  how hard I found it signing the order  to terminate your life!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I surprised you had the courage to  take the responsibility yourself!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess Leia, before your execution  I would like you to be my guest at a  ceremony that will make this battle  station operational. No star system  will dare oppose the Emperor now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The more you tighten your grip,  Tarkin, the more star systems will  slip through your fingers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not after we demonstrate the power  of this station. In a way, you have  determined the choice of the planet  that'll be destroyed first. Since  you are reluctant to provide us with  the location of the Rebel base, I  have chosen to test this station's  destructive power... on your home  planet of Alderaan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Alderaan is peaceful. We have no  weapons. You can't possibly...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You would prefer another target? A  military target? Then name the system!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tarkin waves menacingly toward Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I grow tired of asking this. So it'll  be the last time. Where is the Rebel  base?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia overhears an intercom voice announcing the approach Alderaan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (softly) Dantooine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia lowers her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're on Dantooine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There. You see Lord Vader, she can  be reasonable. (addressing Motti) Continue with the operation. You may  fire when ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're far too trusting. Dantooine  is too remote to make an effective  demonstration. But don't worry. We  will deal with your Rebel friends  soon enough.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commence primary ignition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A button is pressed which switches on a panel of lights. hooded Imperial soldier reaches overhead and pulls a leve Another lever is pulled. Vader reaches for still another  lever and a bank of lights on a panel and wall light up. huge beam of light emanates from within a cone-shaped are and converges into a single laser beam out toward Alderaa The small green planet of Alderaan is blown into space du

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben watches Luke practice the lightsaber with a small "se robot. Ben suddenly turns away and sits down. He falters, seems almost faint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you all right? What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I felt a great disturbance in the  Force... as if millions of voices  suddenly cried out in terror and  were suddenly silenced. I fear  something terrible has happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben rubs his forehead. He seems to drift into a trance. T he fixes his gaze on Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd better get on with your  exercises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo enters the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, you can forget your troubles  with those Imperial slugs. I told  you I'd outrun 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is once again practicing with the lightsaber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't everyone thank me at once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio watches Chewbacca and Artoo who are engrossed in game in which three-dimensional holographic figures move  along a chess-type board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyway, we should be at Alderaan  about oh-two-hundred hours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca and the two robots sit around the lighted table covered with small holographic monsters. Each side of the table has a small computer monitor embedded in it. Chewba seems very pleased with himself as he rests his lanky fur covered arms over his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now be careful, Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo immediately reaches up and taps the computer with h stubby claw hand, causing one of the holographic creature to walk to the new square. A sudden frown crosses Chewbac face and he begins yelling gibberish at the tiny robot.  Threepio intercedes on behalf of his small companion and  begins to argue with the huge Wookiee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He made a fair move. Screaming about  it won't help you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (interrupting) Let him have it. It's not wise to  upset a Wookiee.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But sir, nobody worries about  upsetting a droid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's 'cause droids don't pull  people's arms out of their socket  when they lose. Wookiees are known  to do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see your point, sir. I suggest a  new strategy, Artoo. Let the Wookiee  win.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke stands in the middle of the small hold area; he seem frozen in place. A humming lightsaber is held high over h head. Ben watches him from the corner, studying his movem Han watches with a bit of smugness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, a Jedi can feel the Force  flowing through him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean it controls your actions?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Partially. But it also obeys your  commands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suspended at eye level, about ten feet in front of Luke, "seeker", a chrome baseball-like robot covered with anten hovers slowly in a wide arc. The ball floats to one side the youth then the other. Suddenly it makes a lightning-s lunge and stops within a few feet of Luke's face. Luke do move and the ball backs off. It slowly moves behind the b then makes another quick lunge, this time emitting a bloo red laser beam as it attacks. It hits Luke in the leg cau him to tumble over. Han lets loose with a burst of laught

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hokey religions and ancient weapons  are no match for a good blaster at  your side, kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't believe in the Force, do  you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kid, I've flown from one side of  this galaxy to the other. I've seen  a lot of strange stuff, but I've  never seen anything to make me believe  there's one all-powerful force  controlling everything. There's no  mystical energy field that controls  my destiny.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben smiles quietly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all a lot of simple tricks and  nonsense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suggest you try it again, Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben places a large helmet on Luke's head which covers his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This time, let go your conscious  self and act on instinct.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) With the blast shield down, I can't  even see. How am I supposed to fight?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your eyes can deceive you. Don't  trust them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han skeptically shakes his head as Ben throws the seeker  into the air. The ball shoots straight up in the air, the drops like a rock. Luke swings the lightsaber around blin missing the seeker, which fires off a laserbolt which hit Luke square on the seat of the pants. He lets out a painf yell and attempts to hit the seeker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stretch out with your feelings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke stands in one place, seemingly frozen. The seeker ma a dive at Luke and, incredibly, he managed to deflect the bolt. The ball ceases fire and moves back to its original position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, you can do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I call it luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In my experience, there's no such  thing as luck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, going good against remotes is  one thing. Going good against the  living? That's something else.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo notices a small light flashing on the far side of th control panel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like we're coming up on  Alderaan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Chewbacca head back to the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, I did feel something. I  could almost see the remote.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's good. You have taken your  first step into a larger world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imperial Officer Cass stands before Governor Tarkin and t evil Dark Lord Darth Vader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our scout ships have reached  Dantooine. They found the remains of  a Rebel base, but they estimate that  it has been deserted for some time.  They are now conducting an extensive  search of the surrounding systems.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She lied! She lied to us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you she would never consciously  betray the Rebellion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terminate her... immediately!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirateship is just coming out of hyperspace; a strang surreal light show surrounds the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand by, Chewie, here we go. Cut in  the sublight engines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han pulls back on a control lever. Outside the cockpit wi stars begin streaking past, seem to decrease in speed, th stop. Suddenly the starship begins to shudder and violent shake about. Asteroids begin to race toward them, batteri the sides of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the...? Aw, we've come out of  hyperspace into a meteor shower.  Some kind of asteroid collision.  It's not on any of the charts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Wookiee flips off several controls and seems very coo in the emergency. Luke makes his way into the bouncing  cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our position is correct, except...  no, Alderaan!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you mean? Where is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thats what I'm trying to tell you,  kid. It ain't there. It's been totally  blown away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? How?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben moves into the cockpit behind Luke as the ship begins settle down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Destroyed... by the Empire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The entire starfleet couldn't destroy  the whole planet. It'd take a thousand  ships with more fire power than  I've...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A signal starts flashing on the control panel and a muffl alarm starts humming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's another ship coming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe they know what happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's an Imperial fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca barks his concern. A huge explosion bursts outs the cockpit window, shaking the ship violently. A tiny, f Imperial TIE fighter races past the cockpit window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It followed us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. It's a short range fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There aren't any bases around here.  Where did it come from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fighter races past the Corellian pirateship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It sure is leaving in a big hurry.  If they identify us, we're in big  trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not if I can help it. Chewie...jam  it's transmissions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'd be as well to let it go. It's  too far out of range.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not for long...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirateship zooms over the camera and away into the  vastness of space after the Imperial TIE fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tension mounts as the pirateship gains on the tiny  fighter. In the distance, one of the stars becomes bright until it is obvious that the TIE ship is heading for it. stands behind Chewbacca.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A fighter that size couldn't get  this deep into space on its own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It must have gotten lost, been part  of a convoy or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, he ain't going to be around  long enough to tell anyone about us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE fighter is losing ground to the larger pirateship they race toward camera and disappear over head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The distant star can be distinguished as a small moon or  planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at him. He's headed for that  small moon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I can get him before he gets  there... he's almost in range.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The small moon begins to take on the appearance of a mons spherical battle station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's no moon! It's a space station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too big to be a space station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have a very bad feeling about this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I think your right. Full  reverse! Chewie, lock in the auxiliary  power.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirateship shudders and the TIE fighter accelerates a toward the gargantuan battle station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are we still moving towards it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're caught in a tractor beam! It's  pulling us in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But there's gotta be something you  can do!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's nothin' I can do about it,  kid. I'm in full power. I'm going to  have to shut down. But they're not  going to get me without a fight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben Kenobi puts a hand on his shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't win. But there are  alternatives to fighting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the battered pirate starship is towed closer to the aw metal moon, the immense size of the massive battle statio becomes staggering. Running along the equator of the giga sphere is a mile-high band of huge docking ports into whi the helpless pirateship is dragged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The helpless Millennium Falcon is pulled past a docking p control room and huge laser turret cannons.

dialogues.speaker: VOICE OVER DEATH STAR INTERCOM
dialogues.text: Clear Bay twenty-three-seven. We are opening the magnetic field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirateship is pulled in through port doors of the Dea Star, coming to rest in a huge hangar. Thirty stormtroope stand at attention in a central assembly area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To you stations! (to another officer) Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormtroopers run to their posts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A line of stormtroopers march toward the pirateship in  readiness to board it, while other troopers stand with we ready to fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close all outboard shields! Close  all outboard shields!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tarkin pushes a button and responds to the intercom buzz.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over intercom) We've captured a freighter entering  the remains of the Alderaan system.  It's markings match those of a ship  that blasted its way out of Mos  Eisley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must be trying to return the  stolen plans to the princess. She  may yet be of some use to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and a commander approach the troops as an Officer a several heavily armed troops exit the spacecraft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over intercom) Unlock one-five-seven and nine.  Release charges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Vader) There's no one on board, sir.  According to the log, the crew  abandoned ship right after takeoff.  It must be a decoy, sir. Several of  the escape pods have been jettisoned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did you find any droids?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, sir. If there were any on board,  they must also have jettisoned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Send a scanning crew on board. I  want every part of this ship checked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I sense something... a presence I  haven't felt since...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader turns quickly and exits the hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get me a scanning crew in here on  the double. I want every part of  this ship checked!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A trooper runs through the hallway heading for the exit. a few moments all is quiet. The muffled sounds of a dista officer giving orders finally fade. Two floor panels sudd pop up revealing Han Solo and Luke. Ben Kenobi sticks his head out of a third locker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy, it's lucky you had these  compartments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I use them for smuggling. I never  thought I'd be smuggling myself in  them. This is ridiculous. Even if I  could take off, I'd never get past  the tractor beam.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave that to me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn fool. I knew that you were going  to say that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the more foolish... the fool  or the fool who follows him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han shakes his head, muttering to himself. Chewbacca agre

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crewmen carry a heavy box on board the ship, past the two stormtroopers guarding either side of the ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship's all yours. If the scanners  pick up anything, report it  immediately. All right, let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crewmen enter the pirateship and a loud crashing soun is followed by a voice calling to the guard below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey down there, could you give us a  hand with this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stormtroopers enter the ship and a quick round of gun is heard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a very small command office near the entrance to the  pirateship, a Gantry Officer looks out his window and not the guards are missing. He speaks into the comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TX-four-one-two. Why aren't you at  your post? TX-four-one-two, do you  copy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A stormtrooper comes down the ramp of the pirateship and  waves to the gantry officer, pointing to his ear indicati his comlink is not working. The gantry officer shakes his head in disgust and heads for the door, giving his aide a annoyed look.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take over. We've got a bad  transmitter. I'll see what I can do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the officer approaches the door, it slides open reveal the towering Chewbacca. The gantry officer, in a momentar state of shock, stumbles backward. With a bone- chilling  howl, the giant Wookiee flattens the officer with one blo The aide immediately reaches for his pistol, but is blast by Han, dressed as an Imperial stormtrooper. Ben and the  robots enter the room quickly followed by Luke, also dres as a stormtrooper. Luke quickly removes his helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know, between his howling and  your blasting everything in sight,  it's a wonder the whole station  doesn't know we're here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring them on! I prefer a straight  fight to all this sneaking around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We found the computer outlet, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben feeds some information into the computer and a map of the city appears on the monitor. He begins to inspect it  carefully. Threepio and Artoo look over the control panel Artoo finds something that makes him whistle wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Plug in. He should be able to  interpret the entire Imperial computer  network.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo punches his claw arm into the computer socket and t vast Imperial brain network comes to life, feeding inform to the little robot. After a few moments, he beeps someth

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He says he's found the main computer  to power the tractor beam that's  holding the ship here. He'll try to  make the precise location appear on  the monitor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The computer monitor flashes readouts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The tractor beam is coupled to the  main reactor in seven locations. A  power loss at one of the terminals  will allow the ship to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben studies the data on the monitor readout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't think you boys can help. I  must go alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever you say. I've done more  that I bargained for on this trip  already.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want to go with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Be patient, Luke. Stay and watch  over the droids.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he can...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They must be delivered safely or  other star systems will suffer the  same fate as Alderaan. Your destiny  lies along a different path than  mine. The Force will be with you...  always!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben adjusts the lightsaber on his belt and silently steps out of the command office, then disappears down a long gr hallway. Chewbacca barks a comment and Han shakes his hea in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boy you said it, Chewie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han looks at Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where did you dig up that old fossil?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben is a great man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, great at getting us into  trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't hear you give any ideas...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, anything would be better than  just hanging around waiting for him  to pick us up...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who do you think...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Artoo begins to whistle and beep a blue streak. Luke goes over to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm afraid I'm not quite sure, sir.  He says "I found her", and keeps  repeating, "She's here."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, who... who has he found?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo whistles a frantic reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The princess? She's here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess? What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Level five. Detention block A A-twenty- three. I'm afraid she's scheduled to  be terminated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no! We've got to do something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The droid belongs to her. She's the  one in the message... We've got to  help her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now, look, don't get any funny ideas.  The old man wants us to wait right  here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But he didn't know she was here.  Look, will you just find a way back  into the detention block?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're going to execute her. Look,  a few minutes ago you said you didn't  want to just wait here to be captured.  Now all you want to do is stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Marching into the detention area is  not what I had in mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But they're going to kill her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Better her than me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's rich.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca growls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rich?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Rich, powerful! Listen, if you  were to rescue her, the reward would  be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well more wealth that you can imagine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, I can imagine quite a  bit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'll get it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I better!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right, kid. But you'd better be  right about this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han looks at Chewie, who grunts a short grunt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... Threepio, hand me those binders  there will you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke moves toward Chewbacca with electronic cuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Now, I'm going to put these on  you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie lets out a hideous growl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay. Han, you put these on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke sheepishly hands the binders to Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, Chewie. I think I know  what he has in mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Wookiee has a worried and frightened look on his face Han binds him with the electronic cuffs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Master Luke, sir! Pardon me for  asking... but, ah... what should  Artoo and I do if we're discovered  here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lock the door!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And hope they don't have blasters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That isn't very reassuring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and Han put on their armored stormtrooper helmets an start off into the giant Imperial Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Luke try to look inconspicuous in their armored s as they wait for a vacuum elevator to arrive. Troops,  bureaucrats, and robots bustle about, ignoring the trio  completely. Only a few give the giant Wookiee a curious  glance. Finally a small elevator arrives and the trio enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't see a thing in this helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A bureaucrat races to get aboard also, but is signaled aw by Han. The door to the pod-like vehicle slides closed an the elevator car takes off through a vacuum tube.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several Imperial officers walk through the wide main  passageway. They pass several stormtroopers and a robot  similar to Threepio but with an insect face. At the far e of the hallway, a passing flash of Ben Kenobi appears, th disappears down a small hallway. His appearance is so fle that it is hard to tell if he is real or just an illusion No one in the hallway seems to notice him.

dialogues.speaker: AREA
dialogues.text: Luke and Han step forward to exit the elevator, but the d slides open behind them. The giant Wookiee and his two gu enter the old grey security station. Guards and laser gat are everywhere. Han whispers to Luke under his breath.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is not going to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why didn't you say so before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did say so before!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Elevator doors open. A tall, grim looking Officer approac the trio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you taking this... thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie growls a bit at the remark but Han nudges him to s up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prisoner transfer from Block one-one- three-eight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wasn't notified. I'll have to clear  it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The officer goes back to his console and begins to punch the information. There are only three other troopers in t area. Luke and Han survey the situation, checking all of alarms, laser gates, and camera eyes. Han unfastens one o Chewbacca's electronic cuffs and shrugs to Luke. Suddenly Chewbacca throws up his hands and lets out with of his ear-piercing howls. He grabs Han's laser rifle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out! He's loose!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's going to pull us all apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go get him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The startled guards are momentarily dumbfounded. Luke and Han have already pulled out their laser pistols and are  blasting away at the terrifying Wookiee. Their barrage of laserfire misses Chewbacca, but hits the camera eyes, las gate controls, and the Imperial guards. The officer is th last of the guards to fall under the laserfire just as he about to push the alarm system. Han rushes to the comlink system, which is screeching questions about what is going on.  He quickly checks the computer readout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got to find out which cell  this princess of yours is in. Here  it is... cell twenty-one-eight-seven.  You go get her. I'll hold them here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke races down one of the cell corridors. Han speaks int the buzzing comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sounding official) Everything is under control. Situation  normal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (getting nervous) Uh... had a slight weapons  malfunction. But, uh, everything's  perfectly all right now. We're fine.  We're all fine here, now, thank you.  How are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're sending a squad up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, uh, negative. We had a reactor  leak here now. Give us a few minutes  to lock it down. Large leak... very  dangerous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who is this? What's your operating  number?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han blasts the comlink and it explodes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boring conversation anyway. (yelling down the  hall) Luke! We're going to have company!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke stops in front of one of the cells and blasts the do away with a laser pistol. When the smoke clears, Luke see the dazzling young princess-senator. She had been sleepin and is now looking at him with an uncomprehending look on her face. Luke is stunned by her incredible beauty and st staring at her with his mouth hanging open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (finally) Aren't you a little short to be a  stormtrooper?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke takes off his helmet, coming out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Oh... the uniform. I'm Luke  Skywalker. I'm here to rescue you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're who?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm here to rescue you. I've got  your R2 unit. I'm here with Ben  Kenobi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben Kenobi is here! Where is he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader paces the room as Governor Tarkin sits at the far end of the conference table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obi-Wan Kenobi! What makes you think  so?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A tremor in the Force. The last time  I felt it was in the presence of my  old master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surely he must be dead by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't underestimate the power of the  Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Jedi are extinct, their fire has  gone out of the universe. You, my  friend, are all that's left of their  religion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a quiet buzz on the comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Governor Tarkin, we have an emergency  alert in detention block A A-twenty- three.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The princess! Put all sections on  alert!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obi-Wan is here. The Force is with  him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you're right, he must not be  allowed to escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Escape is not his plan. I must face  him alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ominous buzzing sound is heard on the other side of th elevator door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca responds with a growling noise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get behind me! Get behind me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A series of explosions knock a hole in the elevator door  through which several Imperial troops begin to emerge. Han and Chewie fire laser pistols at them through the smo and flame. They turn and run down the cell hallway, meeti up with Luke and Leia rushing toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can't get out that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like you managed to cut off  our only escape route.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastically) Maybe you'd like it back in your  cell, Your Highness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke takes a small comlink transmitter from his belt as t continue to exchange fire with stormtroopers making their way down the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See-Threepio! See-Threepio!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink) Yes sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've been cut off! Are there any  other ways out of the cell bay?...  What was that? I didn't copy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio paces the control center as little Artoo beeps a whistles a blue streak. Threepio yells into the small com transmitter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I said, all systems have been alerted  to your presence, sir. The main  entrance seems to be the only way in  or out; all other information on  your level is restricted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone begins banging on the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open up in there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and Leia crouch together in an alcove for protection they continue to exchange fire with troops. Han and Chewb are barely able to keep the stormtroopers at bay at the f and of the hallway. The laserfire is very intense, and sm fills the narrow cell corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There isn't any other way out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't hold them off forever! Now  what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is some rescue. When you came  in here, didn't you have a plan for  getting out?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pointing to Luke) He's the brains, sweetheart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke manages a sheepish grin and shrugs his shoulders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I didn't...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The princess grabs Luke's gun and fires at a small grate the wall next to Han, almost frying him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What the hell are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Somebody has to save our skins. Into  the garbage chute, wise guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She jumps through the narrow opening as Han and Chewbacca look on in amazement. Chewbacca sniffs the garbage chute says something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get in there you big furry oaf! I  don't care what you smell! Get in  there and don't worry about it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han gives him a kick and the Wookiee disappears into the  tiny opening. Luke and Han continue firing as they work t way toward the opening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wonderful girl! Either I'm going to  kill her or I'm beginning to like  her. Get in there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke ducks laserfire as he jumps into the darkness. Han f off a couple of quick blasts creating a smokey cover, the slides into the chute himself and is gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han tumbles into the large room filled with garbage and m Luke is already stumbling around looking for an exit. He  finds a small hatchway and struggles to get it open. It w budge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sarcastically) Oh! The garbage chute was a really  wonderful idea. What an incredible  smell you've discovered! Let's get  out of here! Get away from there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han draws his laser pistol and fires at the hatch. The  laserbolt ricochets wildly around the small metal room.   Everyone dives for cover in the garbage as the bolt explo almost on top of them. Leia climbs out of the garbage wit rather grim look on her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you forget it? I already tried  it. It's magnetically sealed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put that thing away! You're going to  get us all killed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolutely, Your Worship. Look, I  had everything under control until  you led us down here. You know, it's  not going to take them long to figure  out what happened to us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It could be worse...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A loud, horrible, inhuman moan works its way up from the  murky depths. Chewbacca lets out a terrified howl and beg to back away. Han and Luke stand fast with their laser pi drawn. The Wookiee is cowering near one of the walls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's worse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something alive in here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's your imagination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something just moves past my leg!  Look! Did you see that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly Luke is yanked under the garbage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke! Luke! Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo tries to get to Luke. Luke surfaces with a gasp of a and thrashing of limbs. A membrane tentacle is wrapped ar his throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia extends a long pipe toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Luke, grab a hold of this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blast it, will you! My gun's jammed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anywhere! Oh!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo fires his gun downward. Luke is pulled back into the muck by the slimy tentacle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke! Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly the walls of the garbage receptacle shudder and  move in a couple of inches. Then everything is deathly qu Han and Leia give each other a worried look as Chewbacca  howls in the corner. With a rush of bubbles and muck Luke suddenly bobs to the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grab him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke seems to be released by the thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, it just let go of me  and disappeared...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got a very bad feeling about  this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before anyone can say anything the walls begin to rumble edge toward the Rebels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls are moving!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't just stand there. Try to brace  it with something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They place poles and long metal beams between the closing walls, but they are simply snapped and bent as the giant  trashmasher rumbles on. The situation doesn't look too go

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait a minute!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke pulls out his comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio! Come in Threepio! Threepio!  Where could he be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A soft buzzer and the muted voice of Luke calling out for See-Threepio can be heard on Threepio's hand comlink, whi is sitting on the deserted computer console. Artoo and  Threepio are nowhere in sight. Suddenly there is a great  explosion and the door of the control tower flies across floor. Four armed stormtroopers enter the chamber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take over! (pointing to the dead  officer) See to him! Look there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A trooper pushes a button and the supply cabinet door sli open. See-Threepio and Artoo-Detoo are inside. Artoo foll his bronze companion out into the office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're madmen! They're heading for  the prison level. If you hurry, you  might catch them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to his troops) Follow me! You stand guard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The troops hustle off down the hallway, leaving a guard t watch over the command office.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Artoo) Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guard aims a blaster at them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! All this excitement has overrun  the circuits of my counterpart here.  If you don't mind, I'd like to take  him down to maintenance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guard nods and Threepio, with little Artoo in tow, hu out the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the walls rumble closed, the room gets smaller and sma Chewie is whining and trying to hold a wall back with his giant paws. Han is leaning back against the other wall. Garbage is  snapping and popping. Luke is trying to reach Threepio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio! Come in, Threepio! Threepio!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Leia try to brace the contracting walls with a po Leia begins to sink into the trash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get to the top!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where could he be? Threepio! Threepio,  will you come in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They aren't here! Something must  have happened to them. See if they've  been captured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Little Artoo carefully plugs his claw arm into a new wall socket and a complex array of electronic sounds spew from the tiny robot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The walls are only feet apart. Leia and Han are braced ag the walls. The princess is frightened. They look at each  other. Leia reaches out and takes Han's hand and she hold it tightly. She's terrified and suddenly groans as she fe the first crushing pressure against her body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One thing's for sure. We're all going  to be a lot thinner! (to Leia) Get on top of it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Artoo) Thank goodness, they haven't found  them! Where could they be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo frantically beeps something to See-Threepio.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use the comlink? Oh, my! I forgot I  turned it off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meanwhile, Luke is lying on his side, trying to keep his  head above the rising ooze. Luke's comlink begins to buzz and he rips it off his belt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Muffled sounds of Luke's voice over the comlink can be he but not distinctly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you there, sir?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've had some problems...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink) Will you shut up and listen to me?  Shut down all garbage mashers on the  detention level, will you? Do you  copy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut down all the garbage mashers on  the detention level.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink) Shut down all the garbage mashers on  the detention level.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Artoo) No. Shut them all down! Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio holds his head in agony as he hears the incredib screaming and hollering from Luke's comlink.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to them! They're dying, Artoo!  Curse my metal body! I wasn't fast  enough. It's all my fault! My poor  master!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink) Threepio, we're all right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The screaming and hollering is the sound of joyous relief The walls have stopped moving. Han, Chewie and Leia embra in the background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're all right. You did great.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke moves to the pressure sensitive hatch, looking for a number.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey... hey, open the pressure  maintenance hatch on unit number...  where are we?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over comlink) Three-two-six-eight-two-seven.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben enters a humming service trench that powers the huge  tractor beam. The trench seems to be a hundred miles deep The clacking sound of huge switching devices can be heard The old Jedi edges his his way along a narrow ledge leadi to a control panel that connects two large cables. He  carefully makes several adjustments in the computer termi and several lights on the board go from red to blue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group exits the garbage room into a dusty, unused hal Han and Luke remove the trooper suits and strap on the bl belts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can just avoid any more female  advice, we ought to be able to get  out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke smiles and scratches his head as he takes a blaster  from Solo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, let's get moving!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie begins growling and points to the hatch to the gar room, as he runs away and then stops howling.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie) Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Dia Nogu bangs against the hatch and a long, slimy  tentacle works its way out of the doorway searching for a victim. Han aims his pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, wait. They'll hear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han fires at the doorway. The noise of the blast echoes  relentlessly throughout the empty passageway. Luke simply shakes his head in disgust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie) Come here, you big coward!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie shakes his head "no."

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie! Come here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen. I don't know who you are, or  where you came from, but from now  on, you do as I tell you. Okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han is stunned at the command of the petite young girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, Your Worshipfulness, let's get  one thing straight! I take orders  from one person! Me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's a wonder you're still alive. (looking at Chewie) Will somebody get this big walking  carpet out of my way?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han watches her start away. He looks at Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No reward is worth this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They follow her, moving swiftly down the deserted corrido

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly a door behind Ben slides open and a detachment o stormtroopers marches to the power trench. Ben instantly  slips into the shadows as an Officer moves to within a fe feet of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Secure this area until the alert is  canceled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me regular reports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All but two of the stormtroopers leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know what's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe it's another drill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben moves around the tractor beam, watching the stormtroo as they turn their backs to him. Ben gestures with his ha toward them, as the troops think they hear something in t other hallway. With the help of the Force, Ben deftly sli past the troopers and into the main hallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, it's nothing. Don't worry about  it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Han, Chewbacca, and Leia run down an empty hallway stop before a bay window overlooking the pirateship. Troo are milling about the ship. Luke takes out his pocket com

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looking at his ship) There she is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See-Threepio, do you copy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (voice) For the moment. Uh, we're in the  main hangar across from the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're right above you. Stand by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han is watching the dozen or so troops moving in and out the pirateship. Leia moves towards Han, touches his arm a points out the window to the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came in that thing? You're braver  that I thought.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han gives her a dirty look, and they start off down the  hallway. They round a corner and run right into twenty  Imperial stormtroopers heading toward them. Both groups a taken by surprise and stop in their tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's them! Blast them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before even thinking, Han draws his laser pistol and char the troops, firing. His blaster knocks one of the  stormtroopers into the air. Chewie follows his captain do the corridor, stepping over the fallen trooper on the flo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Luke and Leia) Get back to the ship!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going? Come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han has already rounded a corner and does not hear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He certainly has courage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What good will it do us if he gets  himself killed? Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is furious but doesn't have time to think about it f muted alarms begin to go off down on the hangar deck. Luk and Leia start off toward the starship hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han chases the stormtroopers down a long subhallway. He i yelling and brandishing his laser pistol. The troops reac dead end and are forced to turn and fight. Han stops a fe feet from them and assumes a defensive position. The troo begin to raise their laser guns. Soon all ten troopers ar moving into an attack position in front of the lone  starpirate. Han's determined look begins to fade as the t begin to advance. Solo jumps backward as they fire at him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca runs down the subhallway in a last-ditch attemp to save his bold captain. Suddenly he hears the firing of laser guns and yelling. Around the corner shoots Han, pir extraordinaire, running for his life, followed by a host furious stormtroopers. Chewbacca turns and starts running the other way also.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke fires his laser pistol wildly as he and Leia rush do a narrow subhallway, chased by several stormtroopers. The quickly reach the end of the subhallway and race through open hatchway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and Leia race through the hatch onto a narrow bridge that spans a huge, deep shaft that seems to go into infin The bridge has been retracted into the wall of the shaft, and Luke almost rushes into the abyss. He loses his balan off the end of the bridge as Leia, behind him, takes hold his arm and pulls him back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (gasping) I think we took a wrong turn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blasts from the stormtroopers' laser guns explode nearby  reminding them of the oncoming danger. Luke fires back at the advancing troops. Leia reaches over and hits a switch that pops the hatch door shut with a resounding boom, lea them precariously perched on a short piece of bridge over Laserfire from the troopers continues to hit the steel do

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's no lock!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke blasts the controls with his laser pistol.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That oughta hold it for a while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick, we've got to get across. Find  the control that extends the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I think I just blasted it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks at the blasted bridge control while the  stormtroopers on the opposite side of the door begin maki ominous drilling and pounding sounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming through!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke notices something on his stormtrooper belt, when  laserfire hits the wall behind him. Luke aims his laser p at a stormtrooper perched on a higher bridge overhang acr the abyss from them. They exchange fire. Two more troops  appear on another overhang, also firing. A trooper is hit and grabs at his chest. Another trooper standing on the bridge overhang is hit by Luke's laserfire, and plummets down the shaft. Troopers m back off the bridge; Luke hands the gun to Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here, hold this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke pulls a thin nylon cable from his trooper utility be It has a grappler hook on it. A trooper appears on a brid overhang and fires at Luke and Leia. As Luke works with t rope, Leia returns the laser volley. Another trooper appe and fires at them, as Leia returns his fire as well.   Suddenly, the hatch door begins to open, revealing the fe of more troops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here they come!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia hits one of the stormtroopers on the bridge above, a he falls into the abyss. Luke tosses the rope across the  gorge and it wraps itself around an outcropping of pipes. tugs on the rope to make sure it is secure, then grabs th princess in his arms. Leia looks at Luke, then kisses him quickly on the lips. Luke is very surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For luck!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke pushes off and they swing across the treacherous aby to the corresponding hatchway on the opposite side. Just Luke and Leia reach the far side of the canyon, the  stormtroopers break through the hatch and begin to fire a the escaping duo. Luke returns the fire before ducking in the tiny subhallway.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben hides in the shadows of the narrow passageway as seve stormtroopers rush past him in the main hallway. He check to make sure they're gone, then runs down the hallway in opposite direction. Darth Vader appears at the far end of the hallway and starts after the old Jedi.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio looks around at the troops milling about the  pirateship entry ramp.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where could they be?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
