dialogues.text: Artoo, plugged into the computer socket, turns his dome l and right, beeping a response.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Chewbacca run down a long corridor with several  troopers hot on their trail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close the blast doors!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At the end of the hallway, blast doors begin to close in  front of them. The young starpilot and his furry companio race past the huge doors just as they are closing, and ma to get off a couple off laserblasts at the pursuing troop before the doors slam shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Open the blast doors! Open the blast  doors!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben hurries along one of the tunnels leading to the hanga where the pirateship waits. Just before he reaches the ha Darth Vader steps into view at the end of the tunnel, not ten feet away. Vader lights his saber. Ben also ignites h and steps slowly forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've been waiting for you, Obi-Wan.  We meet again, at last. The circle  is now complete.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben Kenobi moves with elegant ease into a classical offen position. The fearsome Dark Knight takes a defensive stan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I left you, I was but the  learner; now I am the master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only a master of evil, Darth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two Galactic warriors stand perfectly still for a few moments, sizing each other up and waiting for the right  moment. Ben seems to be under increasing pressure and str as if an invisible weight were being placed upon him. He  shakes his head and, blinking, tries to clear his eyes. Ben makes a sudden lunge at the huge warrior but is check by a lightning movement of The Sith. A masterful slash st by Vader is blocked by the old Jedi. Another of the Jedi' blows is blocked, then countered. Ben moves around the Da Lord and starts backing into the massive starship hangar. The two powerful warriors stand motionless for a few mome with laser swords locked in mid-air, creating a low buzzi sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your powers are weak, old man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't win, Darth. If you strike  me down, I shall become more powerful  than you can possibly imagine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their lightsabers continue to meet in combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo and Chewbacca, their weapons in hand, lean back  against the wall surveying the forward bay, watching the  Imperial stormtroopers make their rounds of the hangar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Didn't we just leave this party?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca growls a reply, as Luke and the princess join t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What kept you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We ran into some old friends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is the ship all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seems okay, if we can get to it.  Just hope the old man got the tractor  beam out of commission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and Ben Kenobi continue their powerful duel. As the hit their lightsabers together, lightning flashes on impa Troopers look on in interest as the old Jedi and Dark Lor of The Sith fight. Suddenly Luke spots the battle from hi group's vantage point.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Leia, Han, and Chewie look up and see Ben and Vader emerging from the hallways on the far side of the docking bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio and Artoo-Detoo are in the center of the Death S Imperial docking bay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Artoo, we're going!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio ducks out of sight as the seven stormtroopers wh were guarding the starship rush past them heading towards Ben and The Sith Knight. He pulls on Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo, Chewie, Luke, and Leia tensely watch the duel. The  troops rush toward the battling knights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now's our chance! Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They start for the Millennium Falcon. Ben sees the troops charging toward him and realizes that he is trapped. Vade takes advantage of Ben's momentary distraction and brings his mighty lightsaber down on the old man. Ben manages to deflect the blow and swiftly turns around. The old Jedi Knight looks over his shoulder at Luke, lift his sword from Vader's then watches his opponent with a s look on his face. Vader brings his sword down, cutting old Ben in half. Ben cloak falls to the floor in two parts, but Ben is not in Vader is puzzled at Ben's disappearance and pokes at the  empty cloak. As the guards are distracted, the adventurer and the robots reach the starship. Luke sees Ben cut in t and starts for him. Aghast, he yells out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stormtroopers turn toward Luke and begin firing at hi The robots are already moving up the ramp into the Millen Falcon, while Luke, transfixed by anger and awe, returns  their fire. Solo joins in the laserfire. Vader looks up a advances toward them, as one of his troopers is struck do

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Luke) Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! Luke, its too late!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blast the door! Kid!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke fires his pistol at the door control panel, and it  explodes. The door begins to slide shut. Three troopers c forward firing laser bolts, as the door slides to a close behind them, shutting Vader and the other troops out of t docking bay. A stormtrooper lies dead at the feet of his  onrushing compatriots. Luke starts for the advancing troo as Solo and Leia move up the ramp into the pirateship. He fires, hitting a stormtrooper, who crumbles to the floor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run, Luke! Run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks around to see where the voice came from. He tu toward the pirateship, ducking Imperial gunfire from the  troopers and races into the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han pulls back on the controls and the ship begins to mov The dull thud of laser bolts bouncing off the outside of ship as Chewie adjusts his controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope the old man got that tractor  beam out if commission, or this is  going to be a real short trip. Okay,  hit it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca growls in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon powers away from the Death Star doc bay, makes a spectacular turn and disappears into the vas of space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, saddened by the loss of Obi-Wan Kenobi, stares off  blankly as the robots look on. Leia puts a blanket around him protectively, and Luke turns and looks up at her. She sits down beside him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo spots approaching enemy ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Chewie) We're coming up on the sentry ships.  Hold 'em off! Angle the deflector  shields while I charge up the main  guns!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks downward sadly, shaking his head back and fort as the princess smiles comfortingly at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe he's gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo-Detoo beeps a reply.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There wasn't anything you could have  done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han rushes into the hold area where Luke is sitting with princess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Luke) Come on, buddy, we're not out of  this yet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo climbs into his attack position in the topside gunpo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke gets up and moves out toward the gunports as Leia he for the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke climbs down the ladder into the gunport cockpit, set into one of the two main laser cannons mounted in large  rotating turrets on either side of the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han adjusts his headset as he sits before the controls of his laser cannon, then speaks into the attached microphon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Luke) You in, kid? Okay, stay sharp!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca and Princess Leia search the heavens for attack TIE fighters. The Wookiee pulls back on the speed control as the ship bounces slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Computer graphic readouts form on Solo's target screen, a Han reaches for controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke sits in readiness for the attack, his hand on the la cannon's control button. INT. MILLENNIUM FALCON - COCKPIT. Chewbacca spots the enemy ships and barks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into intercom) Here they come!

dialogues.speaker: SPACE
dialogues.text: The Imperial TIE fighters move towards the Millennium Fal one each veering off to the left and right of the pirates

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The stars whip past behind the Imperial pilot as he adjus his maneuvering joy stick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE fighter races past the Falcon, firing laser beams it passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio is seated in the hold area, next to Artoo-Detoo. The pirateship bounces and vibrates as the power goes out the room and then comes back on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TIE fighter maneuvers in front of Han, who follows it a fires at it with the laser cannon. Luke does likewise, as the fighter streaks into view. The ship has suffered a mi hit, and bounces slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two TIE fighters dive down toward the pirateship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke fires at an unseen fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're coming in too fast!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pan with pirateship as two TIE fighters charge through th background. Laserbolts streak from all the craft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship shudders as a laserbolt hits very close to the  cockpit. The Wookiee chatters something to Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Full shot of a TIE fighter as it moves fast through the f firing on the pirate starship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two TIE fighters fire a barrage of laserbeams at the  pirateship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A laserbolt streaks into the side of the pirateship. The  ship lurches violently, throwing poor Threepio into a cab fill of small computer chips.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia watches the computer readout as Chewbacca manipulate the ship's controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've lost lateral controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, she'll hold together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An enemy laserbolt hits the pirateship's control panel,  causing it to blow out in a shower of sparks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to ship) You hear me, baby? Hold together!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo-Detoo advances toward the smoking sparking control  panel, dousing the inferno by spraying it with fire retar beeping all the while.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke swivels in his gun mount, following the TIE fighter  with his laser cannon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo aims his laser cannon at the enemy fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TIE fighter streaks in front of the starship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia watches the TIE fighter ship fly over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TIE fighter heads right for the pirateship, then zooms  overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke follows the TIE fighter across his field of view, fi laserbeams from his cannon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TIE fighter dives past the pirateship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke fires at a TIE fighter. At his port, Han follows a  fighter in his sights, releasing a blast of laserfire. He connects, and the fighter explodes into fiery dust. Han l victoriously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two TIE fighters move toward and over the Millennium Falc unleashing a barrage of laserbolts at the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another TIE fighter moves in on the pirateship and Luke,  smiling, fires the laser cannon at it, scoring a spectacu direct hit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got him! I got him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han turns and gives Luke a victory wave which Luke gleefu returns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great kid! Don't get cocky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han turns back to his laser cannon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two more TIE fighters cross in front of the pirateship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: While Chewbacca manipulates the controls, Leia turns, loo over her shoulder out the ports.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There are still two more of them out  there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A TIE fighter moves up over the pirateship, firing laserb at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and Han look into their respective projected target  screens. An Imperial fighter crosses Solo's port, and Han swivels in his chair, following it with blasts from his l cannon. Another fighter crosses Luke's port, and he react in a like manner, the glow of his target screen lighting face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE fighter zooms toward the pirateship, firing  destructive blasts at it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke fires a laserblast at the approaching enemy fighter, and it bursts into a spectacular explosion. Luke's projec screen gives a readout of the hit. The pirateship bounces slightly as it is struck by the enemy fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The last of the attacking Imperial TIE fighters looms in, firing upon the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo swivels behind his cannon, his aim describing the ar of the TIE fighter. The fighter comes closer, firing at t pirateship, but a well-aimed blast from Solo's laser cann hits the attacker, which blows up in a small atomic showe of burning fragments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) That's it! We did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The princess jumps up and gives Chewie a congratulatory h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Threepio lies on the floor of the ship, completely tangle in the smoking, sparking wires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help! I think I'm melting! (to Artoo) This is all your fault.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo turns his dome from side to side, beeping in respon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The victorious Millennium Falcon moves off majestically  through space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader strides into the control room, where Tarkin i watching the huge view screen. A sea of stars is before h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are they away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They have just made the jump into  hyperspace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're sure the homing beacon is  secure aboard their ship? I'm taking  an awful risk, Vader. This had better  work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, removes his gloves and smiling, is at the controls o the ship. Chewie moves into the aft section to check the  damage. Leia is seated near Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not a bad bit of rescuing, huh? You  know, sometimes I even amaze myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That doesn't sound too hard. Besides,  they let us go. It's the only  explanation for the ease of our  escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy... you call that easy?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their tracking us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not this ship, sister.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Frustrated, Leia shakes her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least the information in Artoo is  still intact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's so important? What's he  carrying?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The technical readouts of that battle  station. I only hope that when the  data is analyzed, a weakness can be  found. It's not over yet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is for me, sister! Look, I ain't  in this for your revolution, and I'm  not in it for you, Princess. I expect  to be well paid. I'm in it for the  money!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You needn't worry about your reward.  If money is all that you love, then  that's what you'll receive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She angrily turns, and as she starts out of the cockpit,  passes Luke coming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your friend is quite a mercenary. I  wonder if he really cares about  anything... or anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I care!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, shaking his head, sits in the copilot seat. He and stare out at the vast blackness of space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... what do you think of her, Han?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying not to, kid!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (under his breath) Good...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Still, she's got a lot of spirit. I  don't know, what do you think? Do  you think a princess and a guy like  me...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke says it with finality and looks away. Han smiles at  young Luke's jealousy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The battered pirateship drifts into orbit around the plan Yavin and proceeds to one of its tiny green moons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The pirateship soars over the dense jungle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An alert guard, his laser gun in hand, scans the countrys He sets the gun down and looks toward the temple, barely  visible in the foliage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rotting in a forest of gargantuan trees, an ancient templ lies shrouded in an eerie mist. The air is heavy with the fantastic cries of unimaginable creatures. Han, Luke and others are greeted by the Rebel troops. Luke and the group ride into the massive temple on an arm military speeder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The military speeder stops in a huge spaceship hangar, se up in the interior of the crumbling temple. Willard, the  commander of the Rebel forces, rushes up to the group and gives Leia a big hug. Every one is pleased to see her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (holding Leia) You're safe! We had feared the worst.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Willard composes himself, steps back and bows formally.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When we heard about Alderaan, we  were afraid that you were... lost  along with your father.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We don't have time for our sorrows,  Commander. The battle station has  surely tracked us here. (looking pointedly to  Han) It's the only explanation for the  ease of our escape. You must use the  information in this R2 unit to plan  the attack. It is our only hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The surface of the Death Star ominously approaches the re planet Yavin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grand Moff Tarkin and Lord Vader are interrupted in their discussion by the buzz of the comlink. Tarkin moves to an the call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: DEATH STAR INTERCOM VOICE
dialogues.text: We are approaching the planet Yavin. The Rebel base is on moon on the far side. We are preparing to orbit the plane

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lone guard stands in a tower high above the Yavin lands surveying the countryside. A mist hangs over the jungle o twisted green.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dodonna stands before a large electronic wall display. Le and several other senators are to one side of the giant  readout. The low-ceilinged room is filled with starpilots navigators, and a sprinkling of R2-type robots. Everyone listening intently to what Dodonna is saying. Han and  Chewbacca are standing near the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The battle station is heavily shielded  and carries a firepower greater than  half the star fleet. It's defenses  are designed around a direct large- scale assault. A small one-man fighter  should be able to penetrate the outer  defense.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader, a rough looking man in his early thirties, s and addresses Dodonna.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pardon me for asking, sir, but what  good are snub fighters going to be  against that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, the Empire doesn't consider a  small one-man fighter to be any  threat, or they'd have a tighter  defense. An analysis of the plans  provided by Princess Leia has  demonstrated a weakness in the battle  station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo-Detoo stands next to a similar robot, makes beeping sounds, and turns his head from right to left.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The approach will not be easy. You  are required to maneuver straight  down this trench and skim the surface  to this point. The target area is  only two meters wide. It's a small  thermal exhaust port, right below  the main port. The shaft leads  directly to the reactor system. A  precise hit will start a chain  reaction which should destroy the  station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A murmer of disbelief runs through the room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only a precise hit will set up a  chain reaction. The shaft is ray- shielded, so you'll have to use proton  torpedoes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is sitting next to Wedge Antilles, a hotshot pilot a sixteen years old.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's impossible, even for a  computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not impossible. I used to bull's- eye womp rats in my T-sixteen back  home. They're not much bigger than  two meters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man your ships! And may the Force be  with you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group rises and begins to leave.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star begins to move around the planet toward th tiny green moon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tarkin and Vader watch the computer projected screen with interest, as a circle of lights intertwines around one an on the screen showing it's position in relation to Yavin the forth moon.

dialogues.speaker: DEATH STAR INTERCOM VOICE
dialogues.text: Orbiting the planet at maximum velocity. The moon with th Rebel base will be in range in thirty minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This will be a day long remembered.  It has seen the end of Kenobi and it  will soon see the end of the  Rebellion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Threepio and little Artoo enter the huge spaceship  hangar and hurry along a long line of gleaming spacefight Flight crews rush around loading last-minute armaments an unlocking power couplings. In an area isolated from this  activity Luke finds Han and Chewbacca loading small boxes onto an armored speeder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over loudspeaker) All flight trooper, man your stations.  All flight troops, man your stations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han is deliberately ignoring the activity of the fighter  pilots' preparation. Luke is quite saddened at the sight his friend's departure.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So... you got your reward and you're  just leaving then?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right, yeah! I got some old  debts I've got to pay off with this  stuff. Even if I didn't, you don't  think I'd be fool enough to stick  around here, do you? Why don't you  come with us? You're pretty good in  a fight. I could use you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (getting angry) Come on! Why don't you take a look  around? You know what's about to  happen, what they're up against.  They could use a good pilot like  you. You're turning your back on  them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What good's a reward if you ain't  around to use it? Besides, attacking  that battle station ain't my idea of  courage. It's more like suicide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right. Well, take care of  yourself, Han. I guess that's what  you're best at, isn't it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke goes off and Han hesitates, then calls to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Luke... may the Force be with  you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke turns and sees Han wink at him. Luke lifts his hand a small wave and then goes off. Han turns to Chewie who growls at his captain,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What're you lookin' at? I know what  I'm doing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Leia, and Dodonna meet under a huge space fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, it's Han! I don't know, I really  thought he'd change his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's got to follow his own path. No  one can choose it for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I only wish Ben were here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia gives Luke a little kiss, turns, and goes off. As Lu heads for his ship, another pilot rushes up to him and gr his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke! I don't believe it! How'd you  get here... are you going out with  us?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs! Of course, I'll be up there  with you! Listen, have I got some  stories to tell...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader, a rugged handsome man in his forties, comes u behind Luke and Biggs. He has the confident smile of a bo leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you... Luke Skywalker? Have you  been checked out on the Incom T-sixty- five?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, Luke is the best bushpilot in  the outer rim territories.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader pats Luke on the back as they stop in front of his fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I met your father once when I was  just a boy, he was a great pilot.  You'll do all right. If you've got  half of your father's skill, you'll  do better than all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you, sir. I'll try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader hurries to his own ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've got to get aboard. Listen, you'll  tell me your stories when we come  back. All right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I told you I'd make it someday, Biggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (going off) You did, all right. It's going to be  like old times, Luke. We're a couple  of shooting stars that'll never be  stopped!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke laughs and shakes his head in agreement. He heads fo his ship. As Luke begins to climb up the ladder into his sleek, dea spaceship, the crew chief, who is working on the craft, p to little Artoo, who is being hoisted into a socket on th back of the fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This R2 unit of your seems a bit  beat up. Do you want a new one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not on your life! That little droid  and I have been through a lot  together. (to Artoo) You okay, Artoo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crewmen lower Artoo-Detoo into the craft. Now a part the exterior shell of the starship, the little droid beep that he is fine. Luke climbs up into the cockpit of his fighter and puts a his helmet. Threepio looks on from the floor of the massi hangar as the crewmen secure his little electronic partne into Luke's X-wing. It's an emotional-filled moment as Ar beeps good-bye.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, easy she goes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on tight,Artoo, you've got to  come back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo beeps in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You wouldn't want my life to get  boring, would you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo whistles his reply. All final preparations are made for the approaching battl The hangar is buzzing with the last minute activity as th pilots and crewmen alike make their final adjustments. Th hum of activity is occasionally trespassed by the distort voice of the loudspeaker issuing commands. Coupling hoses are disconnected from the ships as they are fueled. Cockp shields roll smoothly into place over each pilot. A signa holding red guiding lights, directs the ships. Luke, a tr of a smile gracing his lips, peers about through his gogg

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, the Force will be with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is confused at the voice and taps his headphones.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All that can be seen of the fortress is a lone guard stan on a small pedestal jutting out above the dense jungle. T muted gruesome crying sounds that naturally permeate this eerie purgatory are overwhelmed by the thundering din of rockets as four silver starships catapult from the foliag in a tight formation and disappears into the morning clou cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The princess, Threepio, and a field commander sit quietly before the giant display showing the planet Yavin and its four moons. The red dot that represents the Death Star mo ever closer to the system. A series of green dots appear  around the fourth moon. A din of indistinct chatter fills the war room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand-by alert. Death Star  approaching. Estimated time to firing  range, fifteen minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star slowly moves behind the massive yellow sur of Yavin in the foreground, as many X-wing fighters flyin in formation zoom toward us and out of the frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Light from a distant sun creates an eerie atmospheric glo around a huge planet, Yavin. Rebel fighters flying in  formation settle ominously in the foreground and very slo pull away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader lowers his visor and adjusts his gun sights,  looking to each side at his wing men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All wings report in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the Rebel fighters checks in through his mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Ten standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs checks his fighter's controls, alert and ready for  combat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over Biggs' headset) Red Seven standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Three standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Six standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Red Nine standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Two standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Red Eleven standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Five standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo-Detoo, in position outside of the fighter, turns hi head from side to side and makes beeping sounds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lock S-foils in attack position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The group of X-wing fighters move in formation toward the Death Star, unfolding the wings and locking them in the " position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) We're passing through their magnetic  field.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold tight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke adjusts his controls as he concentrates on the  approaching Death Star. The ship begins to be buffeted  slightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Switch your deflectors on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Double front!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fighters, now X-shaped darts, move in formation. The  Death Star now appears to be a small moon growing rapidly size as the Rebel fighters approach. Complex patterns on metallic surface begin to become visible. A large dish an is built into the surface on one side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge is amazed and slightly frightened at the awesome  spectacle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look at the size of that thing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Cut the chatter, Red Two.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Accelerate to attack speed. This is  it, boys!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the fighters move closer to the Death Star, the awesom size of the gargantuan Imperial fortress is revealed. Hal of the deadly space station is in shadow and this area  sparkles with thousands of small lights running in thin l and occasionally grouped in large clusters; somewhat like city at night as seen from a weather satellite.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader, this is Gold Leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) I copy, Gold Leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're starting for the target shaft  now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader looks around at his wingmen; the Death Star lo in from behind. Two Y-wing fighters bob back and forth in the background. He moves his computer targeting device in position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're in position. I'm going to cut  across the axis and try and draw  their fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two squads of Rebel fighters peel off. The X-wings dive  towards the Death Star surface. A thousand lights glow ac the dark grey expanse of the huge station.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarm sirens scream as soldiers scramble to large turbo-  powered laser gun emplacements. Electronic drivers rotate the huge guns into position as crew adjust their targetin devices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laserbolts streak through the star-filled night. The Rebe wing fighters move in toward the Imperial base, as the De Star aims its massive laser guns at the Rebel forces and  fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess Leia listens to the battle over the intercom.   Threepio is at her side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over war room speaker  system) Heavy fire, boss! Twenty-degrees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) I see it. Stay low.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An X-wing zooms across the surface of the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Technical crews scurry here and there loading last-minute armaments and unlocking power cables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge maneuvers his fighter toward the menacing Death Sta

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-wings continue in their attack course on the Death Star

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke nosedives radically, starting his attack on the mons fortress. The Death Star surface streaks past the cockpit window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Red Five; I'm going in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's X-wing races toward the Death Star. Laserbolts str from Luke's weapons, creating a huge fireball explosion o the dim surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Terror crosses Luke's face as he realizes he won't be abl to pull out in time to avoid the fireball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Luke, pull up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship emerges from the fireball, with the leading e of his wings slightly scorched.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke adjusts his controls and breathes a sigh of relief.  Flak bursts outside the cockpit window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got a little cooked, but I'm okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebel fighters continue to strafe the Death Star's surfac with laserbolts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Walls buckle and cave in. Troops and equipment are blown all directions. Stormtroopers stagger out of the rubble. Standing in the middle of the chaos, a vision of calm and foreboding, is Darth Vader. One of his Astro-Officers rus up to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We count thirty Rebel ships, Lord  Vader. But they're so small they're  evading our turbo-lasers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll have to destroy them ship to  ship. Get the crews to their fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke belches from the giant laser guns as they wind up t turbine generators to create sufficient power. The crew r about preparing for another blast. Even the troopers head gear is not adequate to protect them from the overwhelmin noise of the monstrous weapon. One troopers bangs his hel with his hand in an attempt to stop the ringing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader flies through a heavy hail of flak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, let me know when you're going  in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Red Leader's X-wing flies past Luke as he puts his no down and starts his attack dive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on my way in now...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch yourself! There's a lot of  fire coming from the right side of  that deflection tower.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke flings his X-wing into a twisting dive across the ho and down onto the dim grey surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A shot hurls from Luke's guns. Laserbolts streak toward t onrushing Death Star surface. Several small radar emplace erupt in flame. Laserfire erupts from a protruding tower the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The blurry Death Star surface races past the cockpit wind as a big smile sweeps across Luke's face at the success o his run. Flak thunders on all sides of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star superstructure races past Luke as he maneu his craft through a wall of laserfire and peels away from the surface towards the heavens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The thunder and smoke of the big guns reverberate through the massive structure. Many soldiers rush about in the sm and chaos, silhouetted by the almost continual flash of  explosions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs dives through a forest of radar domes, antennae, an gun towers as he shoots low across the Death Star surface dense barrage of laserfire streaks by on all sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Imperial star pilots dash in unison to a line of small  auxiliary hatches that lead to Imperial TIE fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess Leia, surrounded by her generals and aides, pace nervously before a lighted computer table. On all sides  technicians work in front of many lighted glass walls. Do watches quietly from one corner. One of the officers work over a screen speaks into his headset.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Squad leaders, we've picked up a new  group of signals. Enemy fighters  coming your way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks around to see if he can spot the approaching  Imperial fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My scope's negative. I don't see  anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star's surface sweeps past as Red Leader search the sky for the Imperial fighters. Flak pounds at his shi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep up your visual scanning. With  all this jamming, they'll be on top  of you before your scope can pick  them up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silhouetted against the rim lights of the Death Star hori four ferocious Imperial TIE ships dive on the Rebel fight Two of the TIE fighters peel off and drop out of frame. P with the remaining two TIE ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs panics when he discovers a TIE ship on his tail. Th horizon in the background twists around as he peels off,  hoping to lose the Imperial fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs! You've picked one up... watch  it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't see it! Where is he?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs zooms off the surface and into space, closely follo by an Imperial TIE fighter. The TIE ship fires several  laserbolts at Biggs, but misses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs see the TIE ship behind him and swings around, tryi to avoid him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's on me tight, I can't shake him...  I can't shake him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs, flying at high altitude, peels off and dives towar the Death Star surface, but he is unable to lose the TIE  fighter, who sticks close to his tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is flying upside down. He rotates his ship around to normal attitude as he comes out of his dive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on, Biggs, I'm coming in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs and the tailing TIE ship dive for the surface, now  followed by a fast-gaining Luke. After Biggs dives out of sight, Luke chases the Imperial fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the foreground, the Imperial fighter races across the  Death Star's surface, closely followed by Luke in the  background.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is a shot from Luke's X-wing of the TIE ship explod in a mass of flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Got him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader strides purposefully down a Death Star corrid flanked by Imperial stormtroopers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several fighters have broken off  from the main group. Come with me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A concerned Princess Leia, Threepio, Dodonna, and other  officers of the Rebellion stand around the huge round rea screen, listening to the ship-to-ship communication on th room's loudspeaker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Pull in! Luke... pull in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Watch your back, Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Watch your back! Fighter's above  you, coming in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship soars away from the Death Star's surface as h spots the tailing TIE fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE pilot takes aim at Luke's X-wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Imperial TIE fighter pilot scores a hit on Luke's shi Fire breaks out on the right side of the X-wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks out of his cockpit at the flames on his ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hit, but not bad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke pours out from behind Artoo-Detoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo, see what you can do with it.  Hang on back there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Green laserfire moves past the beeping little robot as hi head turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke nervously works his controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Red Six...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the war room, Leia stands frozen as she listens and wo about Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Can you see Red Five?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) There's a heavy fire zone on this  side. Red Five, where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke spots the TIE fighter behind him and soars away from the Death Star surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't shake him!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship soars closer to the surface of the Death Star an Imperial TIE fighter closing in on him in hot pursuit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star whips below Wedge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on him, Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge dives across the horizon toward Luke and the TIE  fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge moves his X-wing in rapidly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke reacts frantically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blast it! Wedge where are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fighter pilot watches Wedge's X-wing approach. Anothe wing joins him, and both unleash a volley of laserfire on the Imperial fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE fighter explodes, filling the screen with white l Luke's ship can be seen far in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks about in relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Wedge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia, Threepio, Dodonna and other Rebel officers are list to the Rebel Fighter's radio transmissions over the war r intercom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Good shooting, Wedge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Red Leader...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader peels off and starts toward the long trenches the Death Star surface pole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Gold Leader. We're starting  out attack run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Y-wing fighters of the Gold group dive out of the s toward the Death Star surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others are grouped around the screen, as  technicians move about attending to their duties.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) I copy, Gold Leader. Move into  position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Imperial TIE ships in precise formation dive toward the Death Star surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars whip past in the window above his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay in attack formation!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Technicians are seated at the computer readout table.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) The exhaust post is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...marked and locked in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader approaches the surface and pulls out to skim surface of the huge station. The ship moves into a deep  trench, firing laserbolts. The surface streaks past as  laserfire is returned by the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Five is a pilot in his early fifties with a very bat helmet that looks like it's been through many battles. He looks around to see if enemy ships are near. His fighter buffeted by Imperial flak.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader races down the enormous trench that leads to exhaust port. Laserbolts blast toward him in increasing  numbers, occasionally exploding near the ship causing it bounce about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switch power to front deflector  screens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Y-wing skim the Death Star surface deep in the tren as laserbolts streak past on all sides.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An exterior surface gun blazes away at the oncoming Rebel fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many guns do you think, Gold  Five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) I'd say about twenty guns. Some on  the surface, some on the towers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia, Threepio, and the technicians view the projected ta screen, as red and blue target lights glow. The red targe near the center blinks on and off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Death Star will be in range in five  minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three Y-wing fighters race toward camera and zoom ove through a hail of laserfire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader pulls his computer targeting device down in f of his eye. Laserbolts continue to batter the Rebel craft

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Switching to targeting computer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Two, a younger pilot about Luke's age, pulls down hi targeting eye viewer and adjusts it. His ship shudders un intense laser barrage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Computer's locked. Getting a signal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the fighters begin to approach the target area, sudden all the laserfire stops. An eerie clam clings over the tr as the surface whips past in a blur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The guns... they've stopped!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Five looks behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stabilize your read deflectors. Watch  for enemy fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've coming in! Three marks at  two ten.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three Imperial TIE ships, Darth Vader in the center flank by two wingmen, dive in precise formation almost vertical toward the Death Star surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader calmly adjusts his control stick as the stars zoom by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll take them myself! Cover me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Yes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three TIE fighters zoom across the surface of the Death S

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader lines up Gold Two in his targeting computer. Vader' hands grip the control stick as he presses the button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cockpit explodes around Gold Two. His head falls forw

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Gold Two's ship explodes, debris is flung out into spa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader looks over his shoulder at the scene.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three TIE fighters race along in the trench in a tigh formation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader panics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into mike) I can't maneuver!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Five, the old veteran, trys to calm Gold Leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay on target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star races by outside the cockpit window as he  adjusts his targeting device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're too close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The older pilot remains calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay on target!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now he's really panicked.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Loosen up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader calmly adjusts his targeting computer and pushes th fire button.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader's ship is hit by Vader's laser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Leader explodes in a ball of flames, throwing debris all directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Five moves in on the exhaust port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gold Five to Red Leader...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks over his shoulder at the action outside of his cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Lost Tiree, lost Dutch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I copy, Gold Five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They came from behind...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of the engines explodes on Gold Five's Y-wing fighter blazing out of control. He dives past the horizon toward Death Star's surface, passing a TIE fighter during his  descent. Gold Five, a veteran of countless campaigns, spi toward his death.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks nervously about him at the explosive battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grant Moff Tarkin and a Chief Officer stand in the Death  Star's control room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've analyzed their attack, sir,  and there is a danger. Should I have  your ship standing by?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Evacuate? In out moment of triumph?  I think you overestimate their  chances!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tarkin turns to the computer readout screen. Flames move  around the green disk at the center of the screen, as num read across the bottom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Rebel base, three minutes and closing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader looks over at his wingmen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Group, this is Red Leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dodonna moves to the intercom as he fiddles with the comp keys.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Rendezvous at mark six point one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) This is Red Two. Flying toward you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Red Three, standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Red Leader, this is Base One. Keep  half your group out of range for the  next run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Copy, Base One. Luke, take Red Two  and Three. Hold up here and wait for  my signal... to start your run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke nods his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The X-wing fighters of Luke, Biggs, and Wedge fly in form high above the Death Star's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke peers out from his cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two X-wings move across the surface of the Death Star. Re Leader's X-wing drops down to the surface leading to the  exhaust port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader looks around to watch for the TIE fighters. He begins to perspire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader roams down the trench of the Death Star as las streak across the black heavens.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A huge remote-control laser cannon fires at the approachi Rebel fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rebel fighters evade the Imperial laser blasts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Ten looks around for the Imperial fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We should be able to see it by now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the cockpits of the Rebel pilots, the surface of the Death Star streaks by, with Imperial laserfire shooting t them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your eyes open for those  fighters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's too much interference!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three X-wing fighters move in formation down the Death St trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Five, can you see them from where  you are?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks down at the Death Star surface below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No sign of any... wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Ten looks up and sees the Imperial fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Coming in point three five.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three TIE fighters, Vader flanked by two wingmen, dive in tight formation. The sun reflects off their dominate sola fins as they loop toward the Death Star's surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader pulls his targeting device in front of his eye and makes several adjustments.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm in range.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader's X-wing moves up the Death Star trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Target's coming up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader looks at his computer target readout screen. H then looks into his targeting device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just hold them off for a few seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader adjusts his control lever and dives on the X-wing  fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close up formation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three TIE fighters move in formation across the Death Star surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader lines up his target on the targeting device cr hairs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and his wingmen zoom down the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader rapidly approaches the two X-wings of Red Ten and R Twelve. Vader's laser cannon flashes below the view of th front porthole. the X-wings show in the center of Vader's computer screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Twelve's X-wing fighter is hit by Vader's laserfire, it explodes into flames against the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Ten works at his controls furiously, trying to avoid  Vader's fighter behind him. RED TEN: You'd better let her loose.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader is concentrating on his targeting device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Ten panics.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't hold them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and his wingmen whip through the trench in pursuit the Rebel fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader cooly pushes the fire button on his control stick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader's well-aimed laserfire proves to be unavoidab and strikes Red Ten's ship. Red Ten screams in anguish an pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Ten's ship explodes and bursts into flames.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grimly, Red Leader takes careful aim and watches his comp targeting device, which shows the target lined up in the  cross hairs, and fires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's away!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An armed Imperial stormtrooper is knocked to the floor fr the attack explosion. Other troopers scurrying about the  corridors are knocked against the wall and lose their bal

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others stare at the computer screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) It's a hit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Negative.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader looks back at the receding Death Star. Tiny  explosions are visible in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Negative! It didn't go in. It just  impacted on the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Darth Vader peels off in pursuit as Red Leader's X-wing p the Death Star horizon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader swings his ship around for the next kill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Red Leader, we're right above you.  Turn to point...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke tries to spot Red Leader. He looks down at the Death Star surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...oh-five; we'll cover for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Stay there...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A wary Red Leader looks about nervously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I just lost my starboard engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks excitedly toward Red Leader's X-wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Get set to make your attack run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's gloved hands make contact with the control sticks and he presses their firing buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Leader fights to gain control of his ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Laserbolts are flung from Vader's TIE fighter, connecting with Red Leader's Rebel X-wing fighter. Red Leader buys i creating a tremendous explosion far below. He screams and destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks out the window of his X-wing at the explosion below. For the first time, he feels the helplessness of h situation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grand Moff Tarkin casts a sinister eye at the computer sc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebel base, one minute and closing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dodonna and Princess Leia, with Threepio beside them, lis intently to the talk between the pilots. The room is grim after Red Leader's death. Princess Leia nervously paces t room.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Biggs, Wedge, let's close it up.  We're going in. We're going in full  throttle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The horizon twists as Wedge begins to pull out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right with you, boss.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two X-wings peel off against a background of stars an dive toward the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, at that speed will you be able  to pull out in time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It'll be just like Beggar's Canyon  back home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three X-wings move in, unleashing a barrage of laserf Laserbolts are returned from the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's lifelong friend struggles with his controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll stay back far enough to cover  you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flak and laserbolts flash outside Luke's cockpit window.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) My scope shows the tower, but I can't  see the exhaust port! Are you sure  the computer can hit it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star laser cannon slowly rotates as it shoots  laserbolts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks around for the Imperial TIE fighters. He think for a moment and then moves his targeting device into  position.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch yourself! Increase speed full  throttle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge looks excitedly about for any sign of the TIE fight

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the tower?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You worry about those fighters! I'll  worry about the tower!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's X-wing streaks through the trench, firing lasers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke breaks into a nervous sweat as the laserfire is retu knicking one of his wings close to the engine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Artoo) Artoo... that, that stabilizer's  broken loose again! See if you can't  lock it down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo works to repair the damages. The canyon wall rushes in the background, making his delicate task seem even mor precarious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two laser cannons are firing on the Rebel fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge looks up and sees the TIE ships.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's targeting device marks off the distance to the tar

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and his wingmen zoom closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader adjusts his controls and fires laserbolts at two X- wings flying down the trench. He scores a direct hit on W

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others are grouped around the computer board

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) I'm hit! I can't stay with you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Get clear, Wedge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't do any more good back there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wedge pulls his crippled X-wing back away from the battle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader watches the escape but issues a command to his wing

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let him go! Stay on the leader!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's X-wing speeds down the trench; the three TIE fight still in perfect unbroken formation, tail close behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs looks around at the TIE fighters. He is worried.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry, Luke, they're coming in much  faster this time. I can't hold them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three TIE fighters move ever closer, closing in on Lu and Biggs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks back anxiously at little Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo, try and increase the power!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ignoring the bumpy ride, flak, and lasers, a beeping Arto Detoo struggles to increase the power, his dome turning f side to side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stealthily, the TIE formation creeps closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader adjusts his control stick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs looks around at the TIE fighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks into his targeting device. He moves it away fo moment and ponders its use. He looks back into the comput targeter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over headset) Hurry up, Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader and his wingmen race through the Death Star trench. Biggs moves in to cover for Luke, but Vader gains on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs sees the TIE fighter aiming at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader squeezes the fire button on his controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs' cockpit explodes around him, lighting him in red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Biggs' ship bursts into a million flaming bits and scatte across the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others stare at the computer board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is stunned by Biggs' death. His eyes are watering, b his anger is also growing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grand Moff Tarkin watches the projected target screen wit satisfaction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebel base, thirty seconds and  closing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader takes aim on Luke and talks to the wingmen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm on the leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship streaks through the trench of the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princess Leia returns her general's worried and doubtful  glances with solid, grim determination. Threepio seems  nervous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on, Artoo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke concentrates on his targeting device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three TIE fighters charge away down the trench toward Luk

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's finger's curls around the control stick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke adjusts the lens of his targeting device.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship charges down the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke lines up the yellow cross-hair lines of the targetin device's screen. He looks into the targeting device, then starts at a voice he hears.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use the Force, Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star trench zooms by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks up, then starts to look back into the targetin device. He has second thoughts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go, Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A grim determination sweeps across Luke's face as he clos his eyes and starts to mumble Ben's training to himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's fighter streaks through the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Force is strong with this one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader follows Luke's X-wing down the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks to the targeting device, then away as he hears Ben's voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's hand reaches for the control panel and presses the button. The targeting device moves away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others stand watching the projected screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) His computer's off. Luke, you switched  off your targeting computer. What's  wrong?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Nothing. I'm all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship streaks ever close to the exhaust port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks at the Death Star surface streaking by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo-Detoo turns his head from side to side, beeping in  anticipation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three TIE fighters, manned by Vader and his two wingm follow Luke's X-wing down the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader maneuvers his controls as he looks at his doomed ta He presses the fire buttons on his control sticks. Laserf shoots toward Luke's X-wing fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large burst of Vader's laserfire engulfs Artoo. The arm go limp on the smoking little droid as he makes a high-pi sound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks frantically back over his shoulder at Artoo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Smoke billows out around little Artoo and sparks begin to fly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've lost Artoo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Artoo's beeping sounds die out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others stare intently at the projected scree while Threepio watches the Princess. Lights representing Death Star and targets glow brightly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Death Star has cleared the planet.  The Death Star has cleared the planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tarkin glares at the projected target screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rebel base, in range.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You may fire when ready.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Commence primary ignition.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An officer reaches up and pushes buttons on the control p as green lighted buttons turn to red.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three TIE fighters zoom down the Death Star trench in pursuit of Luke, never breaking formation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks anxiously at the exhaust port.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader adjusts his control sticks, checking his projected  targeting screen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's ship barrels down the trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's targeting computer swings around into position. V takes careful aim on Luke's X-wing fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have you now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pushes the fire buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The three TIE fighters move in on Luke. As Vader's center fighter unleashes a volley of laserfire, one of the TIE s at his side is hit and explodes into flame. The two remai ships continue to move in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks about, wondering whose laserfire destroyed Vad wingman.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader is taken by surprise, and looks out from his cockpi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's wingman searches around him trying to locate the  unknown attacker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Chewbacca grin from ear to ear.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (yelling) Yahoo!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon heads right at the two TIE fighters It's a collision course.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The wingman spots the pirateship coming at him and warns Dark Lord.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's wingman panics at the sight of the oncoming pirat starship and veers radically to one side, colliding with  Vader's TIE fighter in the process. Vader's wingman crash into the side wall of the trench and explodes. Vader's da ship spins out of the trench with a damaged wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's ship spins out of control with a bent solar fin,  heading for deep space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader turns round and round in circles as his ship spins  into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo's ship moves in toward the Death Star trench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo, smiling, speaks to Luke over his headset mike.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (into mike) You're all clear, kid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia and the others listen to Solo's transmission.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (over speaker) Now let's blow this thing and go  home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks up and smiles. He concentrates on the exhaust  port, then fires his laser torpedoes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke's torpedoes shoot toward the port and seems to simpl disappear into the surface and not explode. But the shots find their mark and have gone into the exhaust port and a heading for the main reactor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke throws his head back in relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An Imperial soldier runs to the control panel board and p the attack lever as the board behind him lights up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stand by to fire at Rebel base.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two X-wings, a Y-wing, and the pirateship race toward Yav in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several Imperial soldiers, flanking a pensive Grand Moff  Tarkin, busily push control levers and buttons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Standing by.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The rumble of a distant explosion begins.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rebel ships race out of sight, leaving the moon-like  Death Star alone against a blanket of stars. Several smal flashes appear on the surface. The Death Star bursts into supernova, creating a spectacular heavenly display.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great shot, kid. That was one in a  million.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is at ease, and his eyes are closed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember, the Force will be with  you... always.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship rocks back and forth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vader's ship spins off into space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Rebel ships race toward the fourth moon of Yavin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke climbs out of his starship fighter and is cheered by throng of ground crew and pilots. Luke climbs down the la as they all welcome him with laughter, cheers, and shouti Princess Leia rushes toward him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke! Luke! Luke!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She throws her arms around Luke and hugs him as they danc around in a circle. Solo runs in toward Luke and they emb one another, slapping each other on the back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) Hey! Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) I knew you'd come back! I just knew  it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, I wasn't gonna let you get all  the credit and take all the reward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke and Han look at one another, as Solo playfully shove at Luke's face. Leia moves in between them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (laughing) Hey, I knew there was more to you  than money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke looks toward the ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fried little Artoo-Detoo is lifted off the back of th fighter and carried off under the worried eyes of Threepi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my! Artoo! Can you hear me? Say  something! (to mechanic) You can repair him, can't you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll get to work on him right away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must repair him! Sir, if any of  my circuits or gears will help, I'll  gladly donate them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He'll be all right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke, Han, and Chewbacca enter the huge ruins of the main temple. Hundreds of troops are lined up in neat rows. Ban are flying and at the far end stands a vision in white, t beautiful young Senator Leia. Luke and the others solemnl march up the long aisle and kneel before Senator Leia. Fr one side of the temple marches a shined-up and fully repa Artoo-Detoo. He waddles up to the group and stands next t an equally pristine Threepio, who is rather awestruck by whole event. Chewbacca is confused. Dodonna and several o dignitaries sit on the left of the Princess Leia. Leia is dressed in a long white dress and is staggeringly beautif She rises and places a gold medallion around Han's neck. winks at her. She then repeats the ceremony with Luke, wh is moved by the event. They turn and face the assembled  troops, who all bow before them. Chewbacca growls and Art beeps with happiness.
